snippet: The United States confirmed steep import duties on solar products from China and Taiwan on Tuesday in a decision that may inflame trade tensions between the two countries....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Slaps Hefty Duties on Solar Goods From China, Taiwan
headline.main: U.S. Slaps Hefty Duties on Solar Goods From China, Taiwan

lead_paragraph: The United States confirmed steep import duties on solar products from China and Taiwan on Tuesday in a decision that may inflame trade tensions between the two countries.
